text: Nabii Ibraahim Malaykak iyyeh: diggah Nabii Luut tet addal yaniih, usuk daalimiinit (koros kinnuk) mayanak, mannal bayissaanaah magaalâ mara usuk tet addal anuk, Nanu tet addal yan marat ixxigah kok nayseh kaak itte Malayka, diggah kaa kee kay buxah maraay kaa nummayse mara finqak naggoysenno, kay barray raaqe marâ luk raqteeh finqitte akke waytek
